item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Saturday, March 15, 2025 at 1:15 AM UTC
item.description:

25. Making Postgres scale (137 points | 120 comments)
26. Everything you say to your Echo will be sent to Amazon starting on March 28 (115 points | 51 comments)
27. Gödel, Escher, Bach, and AI (2023) (5 points | discuss)
